org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.persistence

Class KeyPersistenceSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.persistence.PersistenceSettings
      • org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.persistence.KeyPersistenceSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class KeyPersistenceSettings
extends PersistenceSettings
    Stores persistence settings for Ignite cache key
    See Also:
